column5: He should know that you know that he knows...  I took him there!!
Let me guess?? the spit/islands... been fishing it for 15 yrs.. best pike fishery in ontario..
and you gave me the crap on.............  we have to talk, blabber mouth.  Blah, Blah , Blah..........   April. steel.????
what a beauty looking fish.  not just it's size...it just has such a vibrant flank
Thought you were a member of the "Nuts 4 Big Butts Assocation" Nice fish!   FHR

Psychedelic!. Thanks for not posting the background on the spot Mike. Let them keep guessing. We have left the typical, easy to get to areas because of the pressure these pike have been feeling in the last couple of years. We were in the GTA but thats all I'm saying. MSP was actually hesitant to post this pic in the first place.  I don't mean to sound like a... but I know that you haven't been to this spot Fidel

Had some success pike fishing this spring.Its all about the timing. Fished with my buddy Weedlines on a couple of occasions.We had decent results with jerkbaits from shore. I guess that we have to wait a month till we can get back into them. Sorry about the background on the picture. I dont want to give away or post somebody elses "secret" spot.
sweeeeet, that is one fat pike for sure,how was the fight, i bet this pike is like a tank in fall.
Great looking gator msp Congratulations    May I ask what was the lure of choice to entice this big girl? Thanks for sharing Leechman
wow, awesome gator there.  fat, clean and big.  Did you get a measurement?
Nice fish. Do you have any fat girl photos as well.
nice fish
I think I just dropped a hit of acid.
*phew* here I was thinking maybe I was high from vapors maybe getting in to my car with all the driving I just did, glad it's not just me  BTW, nice fish!
Thats one nice fish .  man the next several weeks are going to go by      s.....l....o....w !  TB
Another real nice one Mike - good job.  Dan
Nice fish Mike!!  Sinker
nice pike!
LOL  Nice fish!
Nice fish. And night time to boot.
Wow one well fed pike
Double barrel purple pike!  I love that spot  Beauty man!
Nice one 4sure...
That's a really nice big pike you caught Amazing that this fish was caught nearby one of North Americas largest city.
Hey Mike was that you and Telly I saw out on Saturday?!  That's a hawg dude!
Nice Pike and a fat one indeed.
WTG Nice size for sure.  Jose
Beauty fish, gotta love those urban pike...  Mike
congrats nice gator

Thanks for the kind words guys. To answer a few questions.......   EFKA-not a bad fight.I had to deal with some floating ice. That made things interesting. BILL M-sorry about the flashbacks........(Lay off the shrooms ) LEECHMAN- The "bait du jour" was a gold husky jerk (HJ 14 ) BEN BEATTIE-Sorry,didnt get a measurement. I could tell you what we estimated it at, but I dont want to open that can of worms( if you know what I mean ) I am guilty of a little trick photography SNAG- I know that you know that I know that you know that I know that you know that I know about that spot. But then again, I think everybody knows. BASSMAN-LOL. This is the internet. Im sure that you can find those fat girls that your lookin for.
Drop me a line in May!
